docs.text: i rented this movie with very high hopes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this movie got praise as one of the best films of 1998 , and unfortunately , was not as good as i hoped , but was still very intriguing and thought provoking .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: first of all , the casting for this film is great .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tobey maguire and reese witherspoon are the future of hollywood .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they play their roles as the parker brother and sister perfectly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with a plot as unbelievable as this film , you need chemistry and honest acting from your cast .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tobey and reese ( bud and mary sue parker ) play their roles perfectly and display their characters with honesty and believability .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: william h . macy , an actor i have grown to love over the past year , turns in another great performance as the tv dad who is torn over his wife , a " colored " person and his friends , the " non-colored " ones .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he also displays believability and must display a certain lack of chemistry with his wife .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he does this perfectly and yet again shows why he should be one of the top actors in hollywood .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: joan allen is equally great as betty parker , the ideal tv mom .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: her character is the most ambitious .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she is very na ? ve , and must display this well to make her character believable and she does just that .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: her lack of chemistry with macy , which the role calls for , and her developed chemistry with jeff daniels is terrific , and if daniels would have been as stellar as the rest of the cast , then this film would even been even better .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as said before , jeff daniels gives a bad performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his character displays the change going on throughout the town , yet he does not display it with enough conviction .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his character is very confusing and he is not very believable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this film could have been elevated to a whole new level had daniels been able to give a better performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie is very provocative .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it challenges the issues of racism that existed in the past and that still exist today .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i really was not expecting all of the elements they brought up , but they pulled them off with such flair that it was mind blowing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they demonstrate the racism issue without a hitch , but do it in a slow pace .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the only major flaw in the film besides the performance by daniels is length .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some films are not meant to be that long .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: pleasantville is one of those films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this film could have been so much better had they not moved so slowly to it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: first , they are amazed by the implementation of color .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: then they want to have it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: then they do not want to .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: then the war ensues between the colored and non-colored .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is all strung out over two hours , which was way too long .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some movies need a lot of time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: saving private ryan was a little bit under three hours long and i thought it could have used more time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this film is only two hours long , and seems much longer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: length is everything in films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if you can nail down the perfect timing and pace , you can win half the battle .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: pleasantville can move at a good pace at times , but it is not consistent enough .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: overall , pleasantville is a very pleasant and provocative departure from the predictability of most films these days .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i went in expecting a light-hearted film about change .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i left learning an important lesson about racism and the way things change .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: luckily , pleasantville teaches this lesson in such a way to make it appeal to all audiences .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: only if it could have done in a shorter amount of time .
docs.label: positive
